analysis.description:
DirectCryptTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#611-641) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

Reentrancy in DirectCryptTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#611-641):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#630-632)
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#632-633)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collected (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#638-639)

Reentrancy in DirectCryptTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#611-641):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#630-632)
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#632-633)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#639-641)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol)

DirectCryptTokenPreSale.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#592-598) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#596-597)

DirectCryptTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#611-641) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#639-641)
	-token.transfer(referral,referralBonus) (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol)

DirectCryptTokenPreSale.refund.refund (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#583-586) shadows:
	- DirectCryptTokenPreSale.refund (function @ /unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#578-592)

Reentrancy in DirectCryptTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#611-641):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#630-632)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investorCount (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#630-632)

Reentrancy in DirectCryptTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#611-641):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#630-632)
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#632-633)
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#639-641)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deposited (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol)

Reentrancy in DirectCryptTokenPreSale.withdraw (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#592-598):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#596-597)
	External calls sending eth:
	- beneficiary.transfer(collected) (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#596)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_contracts/0x12d5b7c26dd8dc6e2f71f5bf240d5e76452b2fe5.sol#597-598)
